mapper.select: select a.price, a.quantity, a.sell_uid as uid, a.order_state as state, case when a.order_state = '1' then 'success' when a.order_state = '3' then 'success' when a.order_state = '4' then 'success' when a.order_state = '5' then 'success' when a.order_state = '6' then '待确认' when a.order_state = '9' then '已申诉' end as msg from user_market_trade_history a where a.user_trade_id = #{id}
